Posts.Content:
Hi I'm Christine 777. I am not new to the Healingwell forum. I have been on the Bipolar side of things.
But now I'm hit with a lump. I don't know yet if it's cancer. All I know is that it is big, baseball size.
And it hurts. I have had a mammogram but I am waiting to have my ultrasound. I will see a surgeon on Monday.
I was just wondering how do they know the difference between a cyst and a malignant lump? Does the mammogram tell you anything besides the size? 
I really had a good experience here before when I was on the Bipolar forum. Thanks in advance for posting. 
Hope to hear from someone soon.
Thanks
Posts.Title: I have a large hard lump and I'm really frightened...and I have questions

Posts.Content:
Thank you. I think mine is not a cyst because of it's hardness and it is not flexible. I am seeing my surgeon this Monday.
I hope he can get me into surgery as quickly as possible.
Thank you for your quick response.
Posts.Title: I have a large hard lump and I'm really frightened...and I have questions

Posts.Content:
Thanks Bev,
I am still a little freaked out. But I'm relieved I will see the dr. on Monday.
I will have an ultrasound on May 24. I hope I can get operated soon after.
Thanks for your well wishes.
Will keep you posted.
